title: Vitol, Trafigura Are in Talks With US Refiners to Gauge Interest in Venezuelan Oil
description: Trafigura Group and Vitol Group, two of the world’s largest commodities trading houses, are in discussions with US refiners to gauge interest in buying Venezuelan oil after President Donald Trump said the South American country would relinquish as many as 50 million barrels to the US.
content: Trafigura Group and Vitol Group, two of the world’s largest commodities trading houses, are in discussions with US refiners to gauge interest in buying Venezuelan oil after President Donald Trump said the South American country would relinquish as many as 50 million barrels to the US.
